accountHolderRef.description: The reference of the account holder that will own the created site.

activationStatus.description: If the site's brand activationURL is set and the site has an inactive activationStatus, clicking the publish button in the editor will result in a redirect to the aforementioned URL.

brandRef.description: The reference of the brand that the site will be owned by. This is the brand reference that has been provided to you.

domain.description: The domain name that will be initially used to access the site. The domain must have DNS mapped to the environment on which the site is being created.
